description:
"I want to get naked. I love being naked."
Those were pretty much the first words out of Chaz's mouth.
He's 20 and he says he's straight. He doesn't have a girlfriend because he'd "rather bang a bunch of chicks than be tied down to one."
To me, he comes across as a guy who could carry on a charming conversation while he fixes your computer.
He's kind of a little guy, and of course he has a big penis. Why do the little guys always have the big dongs?
title: Chaz
